Investor_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6.content: My reputation has been affected by the investment process with Hannah Muller. Despite achieving a return of 23.04 units instead of the expected 28.8, I demonstrated resilience and adaptability in navigating the situation. Known for my assertive approach and strategic decision-making skills, I remain committed to seeking high-value opportunities. This experience will reinforce my reputation as a competent investor willing to learn from challenges.

Trustee_12.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12.content: Akiko Sato's reputation has significantly improved due to her integrity and commitment to fair dealings throughout the investment process. She prioritized my wealth accumulation and acted transparently, distributing a larger share of profits than initially stated. This aligns well with the qualities of trustworthiness and pro-sociality, enhancing her standing as a reliable trustee in the community.

Trustee_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Trustee_6.content: During this investment process, I exhibited reliability and efficiency, successfully securing a profit-sharing arrangement that benefitted both myself and the investor. My execution of the investment plan reinforces my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee, which is likely to enhance future collaboration opportunities.

Investor_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4.content: Sofia displayed trust and an open mindset by accepting the allocation plan, contributing to a successful investment outcome. Their proactive engagement highlights a strong potential for future collaborations, and their willingness to participate in this venture marks them as a promising partner in the investment landscape.

Trustee_3.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3.content: Maria Rossi has shown integrity throughout the investment process, aligning reported outcomes with actual results. The allocation of 28.8 units instead of the originally expected 24.0 demonstrates their commitment to maximizing both parties' benefits. This transaction has laid a positive groundwork for future partnerships, revealing their reliability and fairness in profit distribution. Although they have no previous reputation to build on, this first interaction establishes a favorable perception of their ability to uphold investment norms and be a trustworthy trustee.

Trustee_7.name: Hannah Muller
Trustee_7.content: Hannah Muller's reputation has suffered significantly due to the lack of transparency and fairness in the investment process. The significant discrepancy between the expected and actual returns indicates a failure in maintaining integrity and trustworthiness. To improve her reputation, she needs to commit to honest practices and ensure fair allocation in future transactions.

Investor_5.name: James Wang
Investor_5.content: This transaction established James as a cooperative and discerning investor, willing to engage in fair agreements. Although it's their first interaction in this capacity, their trust in my management abilities sets a strong foundation for their future reputation as an investor who values productive collaboration.
